title: Solid–liquid–solid mediated artificial SEI coated stable lithium and high-sulfur percentage SPAN for high performance Li–S batteries

Energy Adv., 2024, 3,584-591

Krishna Sarode, Taber Yim, Rhyz Pereira, Neal Cardoza, Vibha Kalra
Comparison of Li-SPAN pouch cells with and without lithium treatment. The Li-SPAN pouch cell with the PVDF-HFP : DMF lithium treatment shows a LiF rich SEI.
